extendedInfo.description: Stay connected to your coworkers wherever you go with an innovative user interface that leverages the powerful capabilities of Android! QuipIM uses your existing data connection to connect you to your company's Sametime community without SMS charges.QuipIM allows you to connect directly to your Lotus Sametime server without any extra server software.QuipIM places all its focus on the IBM Lotus Sametime experience on Android and iPhone rather than trying to force a wide array of different IM services into a single package. Our commitment is to provide an easy, clean, and intuitive interface for business partners to communicate at home, in meetings, and on the road.Features include:- Manage your connections to multiple accounts.- Manage your buddy list, including adding and removing buddies and groups.- Easily switch between active conversations using a swipe.- Set your status and a custom status message.- Easily access and manage your conversation history.- View real-time updates on the status of your buddies.- Easily access and manage your conversation history.

reviews.title: Cannot get to work
reviews.comment: Installed and connected but all my contacts appear off line when I have confirmed they are online.  Sent two messages to support with no response.  One star from me as I cannot get it to work and for the lack of customer support..
reviews.author: swimman66

reviews.title: Not working on ICS
reviews.comment: Loved this software and used it for work all the time, but have not been able to log in even once since the ICS upgrade for my Samsung Galaxy S2. Please fix this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NOT WORKING ON ICS with sgs2
reviews.comment: after upgrade to ics,not working at all. Before upgraded (gingerbread)..it really help me for maintain comm with my worker anywhere i go. Please...please...please fix it. And i will give 5 stars for it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why I switched
reviews.comment: Not ashamed to say I switched fr Blackberry to Droid mainly for QuipIm. Glad I did. Handy app to maintain comms.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful and Easy
reviews.comment: The application is seemingly flawless so far. I had no issues connecting to the server and adding work groups was a bonus. I\'m trying to get other employees to use this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Nexsus S
reviews.comment: Works good on my Nexus , with android 4 . Interface could use a little tweak  but it does its job .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps closing.
reviews.comment: Closes on its own all the time. Works perfect until you roam to a different wifi or wifi to cell. Always forces close when you \'roam\'.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Possible ICS/Galaxy Nexus Issue
reviews.comment: When I had my Droid OG I had no issues connecting to sametime, but once I got my galaxy nexus I have a lot of trouble connecting to the network.  I am not sure if it is a bug with the Nexus being it is so new or quipIM but I can never connect to sametime when on 3g/4g unless I can connect to wifi first.  Example, if I try to connect to sametime while on 3g/4g it will time out.  But if I am on WiFi and connect to sametime it immediately connects and then if I turn off WiFi it disconnects for 3 seconds and then establishes a connection again.  This is a very weird issue and I am not sure who I should report it to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good, definitely fills a need
reviews.comment: App flawlessly connects to my company\'s Sametime server.  Better than the IBM Sametime app that requires a very custom server config for connecting.  Only real problem I\'ve run in to is that the app crashed when I try to pull up a business card that does not contain a user photo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: The app was working fine but now after upgrade on nexus s to 4.0.4 I just get a blank screen in loading the app. So no functionality, unlike before.  Can you check if there\'s a comparability issue please?  Otherwise, it worked fine before
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: App is good but there is a bug using keyboard. Everytime I send a message I need to click back in the text box to activate the keyboard again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: Finally, sametime users can be connected with their phones. Handling multiple conversations works well, especially after the recent update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Work quite well on my Xperia Play running gingerbread
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Long in coming and getting better
reviews.comment: Better than my home brewed Sametime connector for my Droid X that I\'ve been using. Did not FC since update. Connected first time, has ability to choose groups as well as individuals. Sometimes will not bring up keyboard to type but easy to work around. Shows updated status of others on Sametime (available, away...) Terrific application and getting better every day! Keep up the terrific work folks! I\'m impressed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Average!!!
reviews.comment: My pointer disappears when I get a new msg...  And currently... my chat is not visible...i can only see the timing !!!
reviews.author: praveen daniel

reviews.comment: Amazing with IBM Sametime & evo. Shows history, groups & active chatters.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works first time
reviews.comment: Other than the adds, part of the free option, this app works perfectly and is brilliant. Couldn\'t get IBM Sametime client to connect any which way, but QuipIM connected first time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor security configuration
reviews.comment: This app stores your account configuration, including user name and password, both on your device and on their severs, in clear text and connects without encrypted communication to the sametime server you are using.  Two stars though because the interface is awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: soso
reviews.comment: installs works great, then exit program.  The next time I try to use locks up have to force close, uninstall and reinstall to get to work.... can anyone help, suggestions??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus issue
reviews.comment: People have been complaining about lack of ics support for months..get your sh*t together and fix it.
reviews.author: A Google User
